favourite.article: Praise You Dear Lord! I glorify You our Lord of Lords, King of Kings. I surrender myself to You Dear Gracious Lord. I am crossing over into Your Will and Your Purpose Dear Lord Jesus. I thank you for this amazing opportunity and I give all praises and glory to You, Dear Lord. I am open and thank You for breaking through and helping and guiding me to cross over into all Your Glory. May Your Will be done on this Your earth. May my journey only be to Your Glory. I give You all of me. Use me to Your fullness. Fill me up with Your Holy Spirit. Guide me and hold my hand on this my new journey Dear Lord Jesus You are an AWESOME GOD. A LOVING CARING, GRACIOUS GOD. I LOVE YOU WITH ALL MY HEART, BODY and SOUL. I am YOURS, use me. Thank You. I praise YOU for raising me up. In JESUS' HOLY NAME. AMEN.
O Lord, I open my whole being to You, that You may break through and make Your home in my heart. The Lord can get through, He just needs our opening up and our giving ourselves to Him.

Oh Lord, break through! Such a sweet yearning for the Lord to gain His all in us. I like this song because it takes us not just through the "breaking through" but to "Lord, gain me totally." The melody is also very in tune with our heart's longing for the Lord to gain all in us.
